static void QSPIFlashReadSFDP ( QSPI_Handle  QSPIHandle,
uint32_t  addr,
uint32_t  dataLen,
uint8_t *  receiveData 
)
static

Description
This function reads flash SFDP.

Parameters
[in]QSPIHandleQSPI driver handle
[in]addrAddress offset to read
[in]dataLenData length of the read operation
[in]receiveDataPointer to store the received data
Return values
None

DMA_IntType  dmaIntType,
void *  arg 
)
static

Description
This function handles the DMA interrupt which is generated from QSPI

Parameters
[in]dmaChannelDMA channel
[in]dmaIntTypeDMA interrupt type FTC/BTC
[in]argDMA interrupt argument
Return values
None.
